name: MovieMixUp
0:
”Alexa, open Movie Mix Up”
”Alexa, start Movie Mix Up”
”Alexa, launch Movie Mix Up”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: movie mix up
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Movie Mix Up is a skill that gives you a random beginning of a well-known movie title, with the last word of a different movie title. Hilarious, or weird fun.

A different title will randomly happen every time, so play over again to see who can get the funniest title. Or challenge yourself to name both movies that got mixed up! 

It's pure silly fun to hear what wacky movie title will come up next. 

You can say:

"Alexa, open Movie MixUp"
"Alexa, start Movie MixUp"
"Alexa, launch Movie MixUp"

Please leave a review if you love this skill, or leave a suggestion for a movie title to include.
Your reviews encourage us to keep making more great skills, and thank you!
